name: Solana BreaKpoint
description: SBT demonstrated important progress in its cross-chain technology, especially through cooperation with the BSC public chain, strengthening the connection and interoperability between the two blockchain platforms. SBT uses its cross-chain function to promote the flow of assets and information, which not only strengthens the ecosystem cooperation between Solana and BSC, but also provides a seamless cross-chain experience for DeFi and other blockchain applications, demonstrating its potential and prospects in blockchain technology innovation.
